n, k = map(int, input().split())
diffs = list(map(int, input().split()))

left, right = 0, n-1

while left <= right and diffs[left] <= k:
    left += 1
while left <= right and diffs[right] <= k:
    right -= 1

print(left + n - 1 - right)

n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]


left, right = 0, n-1
ans = 0
while left <= right:
    if a[left] <= k:
        ans += 1
        left += 1
    elif a[right] <= k:
        ans += 1
        right -= 1
    else:
        break

print(ans)

n, k = map(int, input().split())
problems = list(map(int, input().split()))

left = 0
right = len(problems) - 1

solved = 0

while left <= right:
    if problems[left] <= k:
        solved += 1
        left += 1
    elif problems[right] <= k:
        solved += 1
        right -= 1
    else:
        break

print(solved)

n, k = map(int, input().split())
problems = list(map(int, input().split()))

left = 0
right = n - 1

solved = 0

while left <= right:
    if problems[left] <= k and problems[right] <= k:
        solved += 1
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    elif problems[left] <= k:
        solved += 1
        left += 1
    elif problems[right] <= k:
        solved += 1
        right -= 1
    else:
        break

print(solved)

n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

l, r = 0, n - 1
ans = 0

while l <= r:
    if a[l] <= k:
        l += 1
        ans += 1
    elif a[r] <= k:
        r -= 1
        ans += 1
    else:
        break

print(ans)
